```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
cfu <- read_csv("CFU Counts - Sheet1.csv", col_names = TRUE) %>% 
  as.tibble() %>% 
  group_by(Mouse) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Mouse, y = CFU)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap("Organ") +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle("CFU quantification of Mice organs", subtitle = ("*Mycobacterium smegmatis*"))

cfu
head(cfu)
```
